New Records: Matt Olson has played in 600 consecutive games, dating to 5/2/21, joining a list of greats in the last 50 years
Key Match Events: The Atlanta Braves suffered a tough loss on Saturday against the Toronto Blue Jays, falling 9-5
Pre-Game Insights: The Braves will take on the Blue Jays again on Sunday at 1:35 p.m. ET
Post-Match Reflections: Despite the loss, the game still featured an incredible accomplishment from one Braves player: Matt Olson
Miscellaneous Highlights: The loss puts the Braves 1.0 game behind the New York Mets for the third and final wild card spot in the National League
Others: Olson has been the definition of durable over the last few years, playing in every single Braves game since arriving in Atlanta in 2022
